Feel free to shrink the window down as much as you can (alt1 wont go any smaller than the minimum I've set)

I made this helper as Jagex havent yet bothered to add the ammo type to the buff bar. Which is a no brainer imo.

Game Messages needs to be at least on filtered.

Ensure Chatbox is visible and scrolled down. Use the quiver ammo change so the line "Your quiver will now use the following:" is visble, the bolt type that's active should now be visible.


List of compatible bolts below. If you have the quiver and are using any other bolt types....then you shouldn't have bought the quiver. The list below covers more than what is best in slot for bolt types.
